name: ToiletPaper VR
description:
The world has changed..

You have the only tool to survive..

ToiletPaper VR!

VRJAM2020 Contestant.

That’s my first ever game jam, I’d be really happy to hear your thoughts and critics!

Had very little time this week and done it solo in 16hours, UE4

Oculus Rift, SteamVR support

Thank you!
